author: Sam Zheng
comment: Can't stay at the background. When it works, it's awesome; when it doesn't, it's really annoying. Hope will see an update to fix the problem very soon.

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: Hi, Please try the new version.

title: Sometimes works sometimes doesn't

author: Caleb Escamilla
comment: Won't work waist of money so far. Even after the newest update 1 out of 10 times dialing from the watch fails. I'm currently running with the g watch and a note 3 from Verizon

author: Arturo Quinones
comment: Does not work. Only worked the first time I downloaded it and that's it. I don't even write reviews but wanted to warn people.

author: Lawanda Koonce
comment: Don't work at all waste of money

author: Brian Feckter
comment: Works well on my LG game watch,  thanks
title: Great

author: Han lu
comment: Works well with my HTC one and LG G Watch, really useful for my customer support and sales work.
title: Handy on my lg g Watch

author: Geoff Howes
comment: Works great on my lg g watch
title: Lg g watch

author: Dim Dayz
comment: Can clear an image for a contact, but cannot select a new one from my photos. Can now dial though, which is the main function. Progress!

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: Please try the 'Sync to Watch' on phone App menu, and sometimes the bluetooth transfer is slow if the photo is big, just wait a while and check again.

title: Images Cant be Selected, but Now Dialing

author: Ben Udkow
comment: Like other reviewer, this only works with the phone unlocked and the app itself opened on the phone.  This obviously isn't a solution. :-)  I'm hopeful this will get fixed so not getting a refund.  Using with G Watch and G2.

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: We just released 1.0.5, it works even in the background now. Please send us email xuecsapp@gmail.com if you still have questions.

title: Cannot dial without app open

author: simon ho
comment: suggest to have smaller dial pad so that I can access all the digits in one screen without scrolling.  (update july 28) with the new interface, it is almost perfect, changed to 5 stars !!! !!!

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: Hi, we have updated the dial pad, you can access all digits without scrolling, please upgrade App.

title: finally I can make a call from y G watch

author: Joe Caputo
comment: Does not work for me unless I have my screen unlocked and app is opened on the phone. Does not work as advertised. Also doesn't display contact info, just displays the number.

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: We just released 1.0.5, it works even in the background now. Please send us email xuecsapp@gmail.com if you still have questions.

comment: Doesn't work. Just sits ghdfe. Total waste of money.
